remarks: Least upper bounds in a poset are unique if they exist.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
poslubmo.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
poslubmo.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
poslubmo $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ S C_ B ) -> E* x e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ x /\ A. z e. B ( A. y e. S y .<_ z -> x .<_ z ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
